amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of the funds for high-speed rail in the State of California or for the California High-Speed Rail Authority.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of the funds for high-speed rail in the State of California or for the California High-Speed Rail Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A046) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 186 (Roll no. 288).
